strings.string: llSetColor(vector colour, integer face) Sets the colour on face of the prim
vector llGetColor(integer face) Returns the colour on face
llSetLinkColor(integer linknumber, vector colour, integer face) Sets face to colour if a task exists in the link chain at linknumber
llSetText(string text, vector colour, float alpha) Displays text that hovers over the prim with specific colour and translucency specified with alpha
vector llVecNorm(vector v) Returns the v normalised
vector llGetSunDirection() Returns a normalised vector of the direction of the sun in the region
list llListRandomize(list src, integer stride) Returns a randomised list of blocks of size stride
osDrawFilledRectangle(string drawList, integer width, integer height) Draws a rectangle on a dynamic texture, and fills it with the current pen colour.
osDrawFilledPolygon (string drawList, list x, list y) Draws a polygon on a dynamic texture, and fills it with the current pen colour.
osParseJSONNew(string JSON) Returns osd deserialised JSON to object.
osSetPenColor(string drawList, string colour) Sets the pen colour that is to be used when drawing dynamic textures.
osShutDown() Shut down current Simulator. Authorised Admin Only by config.
aaGetTextColor() Returns the hovertext colour in rotation.
aaUpdateDatabase(Key, xmlDataToPutIntoTheDatabase, Token) Where Key = database field name, xmlDataToPutIntoTheDatabase = serialised XML data, Token = data-password

[APP_NAME] is already running. Check your task bar for a minimised copy of the program. If this message persists then restart your computer.

[APP_NAME] is unable to run because it can't get an 8 bit alpha channel. Usually this is due to video card driver issues. Please make sure you have the latest video card drivers installed. Also be sure your monitor is set to True Colour (32-bit) in Control Panels > Display > Settings.
[APP_NAME] requires True Colour (32-bit) to run. Please go to your computer's display settings and set the colour mode to 32-bit.
